pkgmetadata.longdescription: Find Optimal Sampling Locations Based on Spatial Covariate(s) // Create sampling designs using the surface reconstruction algorithm. Original method by: Olsson, D. 2002. A method to optimize soil sampling from ancillary data. Poster presenterad at: NJF seminar no. 336, Implementation of Precision Farming in Practical Agriculture, 10-12 June 2002, Skara, Sweden.
